content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Maryam Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Maryam, it's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you'll find this apartment to be a comfortable and convenient place to live. How much are you willing to pay for the rent?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mr. Schmidt, I am a student and I am looking for an apartment with the lowest possible rent. I am willing to pay €350 per month for the apartment.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I'm sorry, but that's much lower than my expectations. I'm looking for a fair price that reflects the quality and location of the apartment. Would you be willing to increase your offer?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Understandable, I am willing to pay €400 per month for the apartment. I believe this is a fair price for a student like me.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: €400 is still quite low for the central location and the amenities this apartment provides. I'm sure you'll appreciate the value once you start living here. Are you open to considering a higher offer?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Yes, I understand your point. I am willing to pay €450 per month for the apartment. I believe this is a fair and reasonable price for a student like me.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: €450 is closer to what I had in mind, but I'm still looking for a bit more. This apartment is brand new and in a highly sought-after area. Would you be willing to go up to €500 per month?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Understandable. I am willing to pay €475 per month for the apartment. I believe this is a fair and reasonable price for a student like me.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: €475 is a good offer, but I'm looking for a tenant who appreciates the value of this apartment. It's a great opportunity to live in a new, modern space with excellent access to everything the city has to offer. Would you be willing to come up to €525 per month? This would reflect the true value of the apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I appreciate your point. I am willing to pay €500 per month for the apartment. I believe this is a fair and reasonable price for a student like me.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: €500 is a fair price, considering the location and the amenities. I'm happy to accept your offer, Maryam. Welcome to your new home! TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
